page.title: 08Changes in Village Services
page.content: TAILOR: formerly occupied Ivy Cottage, now a private house. ALE MAKING: thought to have been carried out in Malt House on the southern fringes of the village, now a private house. POLICE: village policeman was formerly housed in Linden Lea opposite school. Village now policed from Wimborne and Linden Lea now private house. DOCTOR: Brook Cottage was used one day a week as a Doctor's surgery, the Doctor coming from Wimborne.There is now no village Doctor and Brook Cottage is a private house. BLACKSMITH: formerly two blacksmiths one at Newtown,one at Flour Mill House now no longer operating in the village UNDERTAKER AND CARPENTER:lived in Diana Cottage now a private house. FARRIER AND BUTCHER: both traded in village but locations unknown.
